title: The Chisholms
text:
The Chisholms is a <a href="CBS">CBS</a> <a href="Western%20%28genre%29">western</a> <a href="miniseries">miniseries</a> starring <a href="Robert%20Preston%20%28actor%29">Robert Preston</a>, which aired from March 29, 1979, to April 19, 1979; and continued as a television series from January 19, 1980, to March 15, 1980. 
Home media.
On June 10, 2014, <a href="Timeless%20Media%20Group">Timeless Media Group</a> released the complete series on DVD in Region 1.
References.
The original mini-series episodes were filmed in Illinois at New Salem State Park near Springfield, and Jubilie State Park near Peoria.
